org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.capacity.conf

类 ZKConfigurationStore

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.capacity.conf.ZKConfigurationStore

  • public class ZKConfigurationStore
extends YarnConfigurationStore
    A Zookeeper-based implementation of YarnConfigurationStore.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration config,
                       org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration schedConf,
                       RMContext rmContext)
                throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Initialize the configuration store, with schedConf as the initial scheduler configuration. If a persisted store already exists, use the scheduler configuration stored there, and ignore schedConf.
        指定者:
        initialize 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        参数:
        config - configuration to initialize store with
        schedConf - Initial key-value scheduler configuration to persist.
        rmContext - RMContext for this configuration store
        抛出:
        IOException - if initialization fails
        Exception

      • getLogs

        protected LinkedList<org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.capacity.conf.YarnConfigurationStore.LogMutation> getLogs()

        抛出:
        Exception

      • getCurrentVersion

        public org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.records.Version getCurrentVersion()
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Get the hard-coded schema version, for comparison against the schema version currently persisted.
        指定者:
        getCurrentVersion 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        返回:
        Current hard-coded schema version

      • getConfStoreVersion

        public org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.records.Version getConfStoreVersion()
                                                                  throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Get schema version of persisted conf store, for detecting compatibility issues when changing conf store schema.
        指定者:
        getConfStoreVersion 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        返回:
        Schema version currently used by the persisted configuration store.
        抛出:
        Exception - On version fetch failure

      • storeVersion

        public void storeVersion()
                  throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Persist the hard-coded schema version to the conf store.
        指定者:
        storeVersion 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        抛出:
        Exception - On storage failure

      • logMutation

        public void logMutation(org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.capacity.conf.YarnConfigurationStore.LogMutation logMutation)
                 throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Logs the configuration change to backing store.
        指定者:
        logMutation 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        参数:
        logMutation - configuration change to be persisted in write ahead log
        抛出:
        IOException - if logging fails
        Exception

      • confirmMutation

        public void confirmMutation(boolean isValid)
                     throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Should be called after logMutation. Gets the pending mutation last logged by logMutation and marks the mutation as persisted (no longer pending). If isValid is true, merge the mutation with the persisted configuration.
        指定者:
        confirmMutation 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        参数:
        isValid - if true, update persisted configuration with pending mutation.
        抛出:
        Exception - if mutation confirmation fails

      • retrieve

        public org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration retrieve()
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Retrieve the persisted configuration.
        指定者:
        retrieve 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        返回:
        configuration as key-value

      • getConfirmedConfHistory

        public List<org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.capacity.conf.YarnConfigurationStore.LogMutation> getConfirmedConfHistory(long fromId)
        从类复制的说明: YarnConfigurationStore
        Get a list of confirmed configuration mutations starting from a given id.
        指定者:
        getConfirmedConfHistory 在类中 YarnConfigurationStore
        参数:
        fromId - id from which to start getting mutations, inclusive
        返回:
        list of configuration mutations
